overview:
12 Years experience in advertising and branding, having worked at agencies including Merkely Newman Harty, Ogilvy, Chiat Day, Digitas, Y&R, and Tribal DDB. Helped launch 360º campaigns for clients IBM, Embassy Suites, Glaxo Smith Kline, and Samsung. Worked on the naming, strategic positioning, and branding for JetBlue, Women & Co. of Citigroup, and Rudy Giuliani’s Twin Towers Fund. Created 360º brand partnership programs for independent filmmakers.

Formed THEDANDYGROUP in 2008 as a collaborative network to develop independent projects.

Most recently helped launch an award winning first-time campaign for Goldman Sachs Asset Management. Currently developing a mobile platform called Known Merchant.
